room_title: Escape room "Candy Land" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: We had a bless last trip to Candy Land  ! It's my first time to play this game. This is a great place for team build up activities! We are going to come back and play all the rooms! We do appreciate the staff's high quality service! Hooray! Wonderful!

room_title: Escape room "Candy Land" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: We booked Candy Land room for two families. It was young kids friendly and we all had a fun time. The theme is good for both adults and kids. It was adorable and colorful theme. The clues were helpful and interesting. The difficult level is intermediate, not too hard, not too easy. We just got out in the last minute. It was a fun experience for all of us. We will definitely book other rooms next time.

room_title: Escape room "Candy Land" by Mission X Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: We had the best time in Candyland!
